info.name: Facebook - LuciD V.2
info.description:
LuciD V.2 is here!
Facebook introduces new changes so I decided to bring a new version of LuciD Theme. More clean, simple, wide and no Ads.
* New coloring more LuciD.
* New scrollbar style.
* New animations.
* New Post Box.
* Fullscreen fixes.
* Centralized posts fixes.
* New Top Bar.
* Fixes to Left/Right Sidebars.
* New chat window.
* New full chat.
* New notifications.
* New style to Facebook Reactions.
* CSS Code optimized for fast loading. 
and more...
=-----------------------------------------------------------------=
I hope you like it and please leave a rate. Thanks.
info.additionalInfo:
Created and tested with Chrome Browser in March 2016 Facebook version.

=-----------------------------------------------------------------=
CHANGE LOG (June 30, 2016):
* Top Bar fix.
* Big update to centralize timeline posts.

data.title: Beautiful Facebook theme with Vista and Firefox

Gets rid of all the right hand columns on group pages
